metadata.title: CVE-2021-3803 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
nth-check is vulnerable to Inefficient Regular Expression Complexity

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3803` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-nth-check - 1.0.1-1+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-nth-check package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-1+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
